level.heading: Deed in lieu of foreclosure.
level.text: ยง 11-422 Deed in lieu of foreclosure. The city may when authorized by resolution of the board of estimate and in lieu of prosecuting an action to foreclose a tax lien on any parcel pursuant to this chapter accept a conveyance of the interest of any person having any right, title, interest, claim, lien or equity of redemption in or to such parcel.
